groups.name: autoai.model
groups.description: AutoAi large model configuration, supporting various adapters such as BigModel, MiniMax, and OpenAI.

groups.name: autoai.react
groups.description: AutoAi ReAct engine configuration, controlling the behavior of the Thought-Action-Observation loop.

groups.name: autoai.web
groups.description: AutoAi Web service configuration, providing OpenAI-compatible REST API interfaces.

properties.name: autoai.model.adapter
properties.description: Model adapter type, supports BigModel, MiniMax, OpenAI

properties.name: autoai.model.model
properties.description: Model name, for example: GLM-4.7, gpt-4, etc.

properties.name: autoai.model.api-key
properties.description: API key, recommended to configure via environment variable

properties.name: autoai.model.base-url
properties.description: API base URL (optional), uses adapter default address if not configured

properties.name: autoai.react.show-tool-details
properties.description: Whether to show tool execution details; true shows complete output, false only shows success/failure

properties.name: autoai.react.language
properties.description: System prompt language, supports zh (Chinese) or en (English)

properties.name: autoai.web.base-path
properties.description: Web service base path, defaults to /auto-ai
